abstracts.cdata!:
This memorandum seeks the approval of
            the Executive Directors to amend the size and scope of the
            Third Kecamatan Development Project for Indonesia. The
            Project was approved by the Executive Directors on June
            26,2003. Indonesia's Ministry of Finance has now
            requested that the Bank reduce the size of the total
            Loan/Credit package from US$249.8 million to US$91 .0
            million. The request is triggered by their overall debt
            management strategy, and because the national
            decentralization law package is currently undergoing
            internal review. The amendment will not result in any
            changes to the original objectives of the project as
            approved by the Board, to any specific implementation
            arrangements, or to the safeguards provisions. The Ministry
            of Home Affairs would remain the responsible agency for
            Project execution.
